update db_proxy.sardine_returnntcBill

sourceBillType = #{sourceBillType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sourceBillNumber=#{sourceBillNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select t.*,a.code articleCode,a.name articleName,s.code supplierCode,s.name supplierName from db_proxy.sardine_returnntcbillitem t,db_proxy.sardine_article a,db_proxy.sardine_supplier s where t.articleuuid=a.uuid and t.supplieruuid=s.uuid and t.returnntcbilluuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by line
